Description:
Detect commandline usage of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer (cmstp.exe) to install specially formatted local .INF files

Author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Bypass UAC via CMSTP
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\cmstp.exe' and original_file_name = 'cmstp.exe') and (command like '%/s%' or command like '%-s%' or command like '%/au%' or command like '%-au%' or command like '%/ni%' or command like '%-ni%'))
